name: town-of-wiley-website
description: Official website for the Town of Wiley - ADA compliant municipal government website

scripts.setup: echo Setting up Node.js PATH... && powershell -Command "$env:PATH += ';C:\Program Files\nodejs'" && node --version && npm --version
scripts.agent:start: echo 'Agentic workflow ready. Use GitHub Copilot for AI-assisted development.' && npm run dev
scripts.agent:debug: echo 'Starting debug session with Modernizr feature detection...' && npm run debug
scripts.test: npm run test:html && npm run test:css && npm run test:yaml && npm run test:accessibility:ci
scripts.test:modernizr: node -e "console.log('ðŸ”§ Testing Modernizr build...'); const fs = require('fs'); const path = './assets/js/modernizr-custom.js'; if (fs.existsSync(path)) { const size = fs.statSync(path).size; console.log('âœ… Modernizr build exists:', (size/1024).toFixed(1) + 'KB'); } else { console.error('âŒ Modernizr build missing'); process.exit(1); }"
scripts.validate: html-validate index.html && stylelint assets/css/styles.css && npm run test:yaml
scripts.validate:all: npm run validate && npm run test:modernizr && echo 'âœ… All validations passed'
scripts.build: npm run css:build:prod && npm run modernizr:build && node build.js build && echo 'âœ… Build complete with Tailwind CSS and Modernizr integration'
scripts.security-audit: npm audit && echo 'Manual security review recommended - see SECURITY_AUDIT.md'
scripts.full-audit: npm run test && npm run security-audit && npm run performance-audit
scripts.workflow:init: echo 'Initializing agentic workflow...' && npm run build && npm run agent:start

author: Town of Wiley Government
